[spoiler] å½“æ¸¸æˆä¸å†çº¯ç²¹ï¼Œå½“æ¸¸æˆå…¬å¸ä¸€å¿ƒåªæƒ³ç€é’±ï¼Œç©å®¶çš„æƒ…æ€€å’Œå–œçˆ±å°†ä¼šåŒ–ä¸ºç°çƒ¬ã€‚When the game is no longer pure, when the game company is only focused on money, the feelings and affection of players will be reduced to ashes. [/spoiler]

Once there was a game called overwatch which i dive in . I miss everything in the past. Whenever OW comes up with a brand-new CG, I can be very excited to share it with my classmates, because this is a game I once liked very much. I always look forward to the new news about OW brought by the annual BlizzCon, such as Overwatch 2 in 2019. This is a very suitable game for PVE, and I am also looking forward to everything Jeff said at the press conference.
     It is because of the expectation of  OW2, I survived the release of 2020 and 2021 with only two new heroes. These two years have been very painful for our players. We play the same mode and the same map day by day and finally, Overwatch 2 was released, but it was not as claimed that year. 
     I hope Blizzard can treat the  game well and don't let it become a false demonstration in the history of  games.
